yaak.schedule
Class PooledThread

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      yaak.schedule.PooledThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class PooledThread
extends java.lang.Thread

PooledThread adds the capability for setting the current runnable object.

Version:
$Id: PooledThread.java 6 2005-06-08 17:00:15Z jsmith $
Author:
Jerry Smith
See Also:

Method Detail

setRunnable

public final void setRunnable(java.lang.Runnable runMe)

Associates a runnable object with the thread.

Parameters:
runMe - The runnable object that implements a task.

getRunnable

public final java.lang.Runnable getRunnable()

Retrieves the runnable object.

Returns:
The runnable object associated with this thread instance.

isIdle

public final boolean isIdle()

Retrieves the idle state.

Returns:
Whether or not the thread has completed its task.

hasBeenInterrupted

public final boolean hasBeenInterrupted()

Retrieves the interrupted state.

Returns:
Whether or not the thread has been interrupted.

run

public final void run()

Runs the scheduled task (the Runnable object's run() method), setting the idle state before and after the execution sequence.

shutdown

public final void shutdown()

Shuts down the thread.
